subject: Re: Attention:  Lewis D. Noogie, UNITED NATIONS OFFICE
body:
UNITED NATIONS OFFICE             405 East 42nd Street, New York, NY, 10017,USA
                  OUR REF: UN / US / 021.7XXVX / 901
                 YOUR REF: UNA / USA / 255-U7 / 2024
                PHONE NUMBER +1  646) 902-1153                     EMAIL:unitednations00121@aol.com

Attention:  Lewis D. Noogie,                                                     NOTICE TO PAY YOU.
I received your email, with your details,  I would like you to choose from the options how you would like to receive your funds
By ATM CARD,CERTIFIED BANK CHECK or OPENING OF AN ONLINE ACCOUNT IN YOUR NAME, Also, I have send your details to the legal department to process the Fund Approval and Fund Ownership Certificate, once these documents are out I will send it to you and to the bank to start the processing of your choice of receiving your fund.


You can send message on whats-app to the number this phone number+1  646) 902-1153 add me on your whatsapp
We look forward to hearing from you soonest.
Robert Russell
Department Of Treasury Direct-AccountUnited Nations Fund's Remittance
PHONE NUMBER +1  646) 902-1153
